speaker: detective
dialogue: The car came to a stop and I looked outside to see the city dump. The moth goons throw me out of the car. I was so focused on Sheila that I didn't even notice that they were driving me out of town. They laugh at me.

speaker: thug
dialogue: "Smell you later Detective! Don't worry, we'll take good care of your partner when we find her!"

speaker: detective
dialogue: "Darn you Moths!" I yell as they drive off.

speaker: detective
dialogue: I'm a fool and now I'm stuck in this dump with no clues of where Shiela is...

speaker: detective
dialogue: Wait, what are these papers that fell out of my coat?
